body_html:
Thanks for tracking that down shreyneil@.

The "root" section of the website is synced to releases, but this fix is already visible in the tf 1.3 docs.

This these docs will become "root" when 1.3 is released.

body:
Thanks for tracking that down shreyneil@. 

The "root" section of the website is synced to releases, but this fix is already visible in the [tf 1.3 docs](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.3/get_started/get_started).

This these docs will become "root" when 1.3 is released.
